cobblemon.species.ironabyss.name: Iron Abyss
cobblemon.species.ironabyss.desc1: It resembles a nightmarish concept introduced in a paranormal magazine that takes a similar form to that of Darkrai.
cobblemon.species.ironabyss.desc2: It is said that the black hole contained inside absorbed the surrounding area around it, not one survivor was found.
cobblemon.species.diancie-az.name: Diancie
cobblemon.species.diancie-az.desc: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its green, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
cobblemon.species.ironguardian.name: Iron Guardian
cobblemon.species.ironguardian.desc: It resembles a mecha that was featured in a popular paranormal magazine. This mecha was said to be a modified Golurk.
cobblemon.species.searinghorizons.name: Searing Horizons
cobblemon.species.searinghorizons.desc: According to a report in a dubious magazine, this Pokémon was seen soaring through the ancient skies.
cobblemon.species.carbink-az.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.carbink-az.desc: Some say that deep beneath the surface of the world, a pack of Carbink live with their queen in a kingdom of jewels.
cobblemon.species.roggenrola-az.name: Roggenrola
cobblemon.species.roggenrola-az.desc: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly cold to the touch.
cobblemon.species.boldore-az.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.boldore-az.desc: The energy overflowing from its body has turned into blue crystals that are hard enough to smash diamonds.
cobblemon.species.gigalith-az.name: Gigalith
cobblemon.species.gigalith-az.desc: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
cobblemon.species.regirock-az.name: Regirock
cobblemon.species.regirock-az.desc: Every bit of Regirock’s body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what’s been lost.
cobblemon.species.corsola-az.name: Corsola
cobblemon.species.corsola-az.desc: Corsola’s branches glitter very beautifully in seven colors when they catch sunlight. If any branch breaks off, this Pokémon grows it back in just one night.
cobblemon.species.onix-az.name: Onix
cobblemon.species.onix-az.desc: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
cobblemon.species.steelix-az.name: Steelix
cobblemon.species.steelix-az.desc: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix. This Pokémon is known to dig toward the earth’s core. There are records of this Pokémon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
cobblemon.species.feralspine.name: Feral Spine
cobblemon.species.feralspine.desc: It's said to be able to break large boulders with it's sharp teeth. This Pokémon seems to resemble an ancient form of Feraligatr.
cobblemon.species.nacli-az.name: Nacli
cobblemon.species.nacli-az.desc: The ground scrapes its body as it travels, causing it to leave salt behind. Salt is constantly being created and replenished inside Nacli’s body.
cobblemon.species.naclstack-az.name: Naclstack
cobblemon.species.naclstack-az.desc: This Pokémon dry cures its prey by spraying salt over them. The curing process steals away the water in the prey’s body.
cobblemon.species.garganacl-az.name: Garganacl
cobblemon.species.garganacl-az.desc: Garganacl will rub its fingertips together and sprinkle injured Pokémon with salt. Even severe wounds will promptly heal afterward.
cobblemon.species.ironascent.name: Iron Ascent
cobblemon.species.ironascent.desc: It resembles a futuristic form of Rayquaza that was featured in a paranormal magazine.
